title: ninnu nera
sahitya:
ninnu nera nammitirA nIrajnAbhA


anupallavi

  kanikaramutO nannu grakkuna brOtuvani


caraNam 1    sharaNAgata vatsaluDani vini nE sharaNu joccina nannu saraguna brOtuvani
    caraNam 2    pApapu rOgamu pArOli nannu nI dApuna jErcciyika dayayunci brOtuvani
    caraNam 3    gOpAladAsupai kOpamu cAlinci shrI pAvanamUrti sirulicci brOtuvani
